sub_title: ✪✪ How to expect better results when nothing changes ✪✪
summary:
Hello! I am Godfried Wehrens. My dedication is to create solid business partnerships, along with my steadfast motivation leading to achieve business objectives and improve business controlling. I have background in supervising multiple and international teams, diverse departments, involved in steering daily business and finance, project & controlling operations. 
Business Partner, Business Controller, (Project)Manager and Director who achieves results through motivated people. Gets and keeps your company in control. From accounting to strategy experience.    

I am adept at project management (very broad range) and getting companies in control, maintaining healthy (financial) position, enhancing investor confidence and instrumental in developing all necessary policies and procedures to ensure the sound (financial) management and control of the company’s business. I have strong communication skills combined with demonstrated hands-on capability to build robust relationships and manage competing demands result in the achievement of challenging goals.

Following are some of my key accomplishments:
•	Very successful full scope post-merger integration of 9 EU companies, exceeding all objectives
•	Exceeded financial targets (> 20% growth within 4 years), transforming the complete company from sales- to profit accountability 
•	Brought several companies in control within +/- 1% result deviation to forecast
•	Implemented SAP R/3 successfully within 5 months. Also other IT projects and business cases
•	Developed MIS tools and methods which were implemented globally (Sales, COGS)
•	Led a start-up company to global no. 2 position (ROCE%) after building a plant.

My compentencies are excellent presentation skills, empathy, social and multicultural awareness, people management and development, result and goal oriented, very pro-active, entrepreneur, commercial, flexible, hands-on, multi-tasking and analytical. 

Connect with me today to find out how I’ll make your mission my mission, to help bring ALL of your business objectives into focus and improve people, processes and profits ! Contact me on g.wehrens@ziggo.nl.

treasury_media.description: Leadership is all about showing it to the organisation.

treasury_media.title: Change the plan but never the goal

profile_positions.description:
* Control and improve the financial organization as far as reporting and analysis, processes and management accounting is concerned
* Project Management: Projectleader ERP Selection and Implementation
*  Execution of business cases, scenario analysis, costprice calculations and business ecomomic analysis
* Identify and analyze business improvement measures and cases
* Sparring partner of senior business management with regard to all matters.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Controller / co-ERP Project Manager

profile_positions.description: As consultant and interim manager, I navigate on all facets that affects the business. Part of this is assisting management in a critical manner with advice and deeds within finance, controlling, business operations, auditing, project management, processes, organizational development and capacity issues. I map the progress of the activities and the relevant developments in and around the business, analyze in scenarios, advise management on possible (control) measures and oversee the achievement of the agreed objectives Main focus is to realize the ambitions or improvements in operational management.
profile_positions.title: Business and Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
SECONDED TO DSM by Yacht Finance Interim professionals.
During this tenue, I played an integral role in FP&A and reporting, while serving as project controller for an important efficiency project. I also acted as business partner, navigator and interface for several GBS service units.   
Some of my key accomplishments were:
☛Structured a global efficiency project and provided initial actuals and forecasts compared to business case, which led to control. Communicated and embedded project properly
☛In close co-operationand with all functional controllers (matrix organisation), improved reporting, forecasting, KPI's and control of all GBS units.

DSM is a global science-based company in Nutrition, Health and Sustainable Living; Global SSC Holding in Sittard, 23.000 employees worldwide, Sales €6Bn., listed in NL.
profile_positions.title: Business Controller GBS / Finance Interim Professional  ★

profile_positions.description:
I was held accountable for implementing operational excellence, initiating, managing and executing several projects within the supply chain area. I directed business improvements in all areas, including 4% cost reduction within operations, new sales channel development in mainly retail and new organisational structure within the supply chain area.
Below are a few of my notable contributions:
☛Attained desired business outcomes and objectives by directing and motivating 120 employees
☛Improved work performance effectiveness by auditing/optimizing processes, structures, efficiency and costs within logistics and transport
☛prepared several other buisness cases, including soft/hardware for trucks and transport management. 

Company is a leading supplier of Asian and other world food authentic A-Brands to supermarket-, retail- and foodservice customers in Western Europe with 230 employees on 3 sites.
profile_positions.title: Business Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
KNORR-BREMSE POWERTECH GMBH - I performed various assigned functions, including finance and control, IT and facility, improving (project) control, credibility, efficiency and profitability. I executed post-merger integration activities for four entities, while focusing on getting “in control”. I guaranteed compliance with laws and regulations by auditing and implementing group guidelines and policies.

Following are highlights of my key accomplishments:
☛Ensured the chance of business success by optimizing the P&C and strategic structure in order to reach desired profit level 
☛Accomplished bottom-line results by improving project management financials and project control  (technical engineering and manufacturing projects)) 

Company is a leading and global project supplier and manufacturer of power supply systems for rail vehicles, industry and research, with 500 employees on 4 production sites and 3 continents. Total Sales €85M. The Knorr-Bremse Group, with head office in Munich, employs more than 20.000 employees.
profile_positions.title: Director Finance and Controlling

profile_positions.description:
CARAMABA HOLDING GMBH - Chemical Divison of the Berner Group.
I had corporate and full-scope post merger integration project responsibility (“syntegration”) of an acquired group of  9 companies “KENT” (450 employees). Main task was to improve efficiency, profitability and co-operation within the Berner Group. Additionally, as interim assignment, appointed as Head of KENT Division plus Business Controller. 
Responsibilities, tasks and achievements:
☛Successfully integrated the group and exceeded all objectives (savings, efficiency)
☛Prepared (strategic) business cases and achieved 6% cost savings plus implemented efficiency improving measures (processes, quality and sales force management)
☛Acted as business partner of all KENT directors and managers, based on trust 
☛Initiated and participated in business audits and reviews and achieved sales and profit growth.

Company is a leading chemical specialist, division holding, acting as system partner for cleaning and maintenance, with 24 legal EU entities and a global distributor network. Sales € 160M, 1.100 employees, part of Berner SE in Künzelsau, Germany).
profile_positions.title: Post Merger Integration Manager

profile_positions.description:
MEDRAD EUROPE BV - a fully owned subsidiary of BAYER AG 
I initially started as Finance Director. As per January 2009, also HR, IT, Customer Support and Office Management in Europe (SSC) was added to my responsibilities. I supervised 50 employees, of which 9 direct and was also Board and MT member in 9 countries. 
Responsibilities, tasks and achievements:
☛As EMEA CAO, improved leadership and achieved better results (>25%)
☛Improved forecasting accuracy within +/- 0.5% yield. Company in control again, able to take the right decisions, transfer from sales to profit orientation. Crucial auditing 
☛Integrated, motivated and developed a large Corporate Services team (50 FTE). Team accelerated and employee satisfaction scores improved (>25%)
☛Implemented (commercial) reporting system (GAAP /US-GAAP) 
☛Implemented a new P&C cycle. Result was clarity, consistency and efficiency
☛Outsourced non added value tasks to Bayer and reduced expenses
☛Strategic re-alignment for HR, IT and CS departments, using a bottom up approach.

Company is the Head Office of a leading medical device company, 9 EU entities plus a distributor network in EMEA. Sales € 100M, 240 employees, part of Medrad Inc. US / Bayer AG Germany).
profile_positions.title: Director Corporate Services Europe / Finance Director

profile_positions.description:
I performed various assigned functions, including finance and control, IT and QM, improving control, credibility, efficiency and profitability. I revised profit center accounting, created sales scorecards and improved HR policies using business and process insights, all focusing on getting “in control”. Supervision of 16 employees, of which 4 direct. MT member in 3 countries. 

Following are highlights of my key accomplishments:
☛Implemented SAP R3, responsible for FI/CO in Benelux. Member of project team as well
☛Improved forecasting accuracy within +/- 5% yield. Region in control again
☛Implemented new profit centre accounting, using ABC, led to the sale of 1 division  
☛Implemented reporting system (HGB/GAAP), risk management system, cash pooling, interest hedging 
☛Transferred from sales to profit orientation (breakeven tools, sales scorecards, etc)

Company is a leading B2B direct seller of tools and consumables within the construction and automotive sector. Sales € 55M, 370 employees, 3 legal entities, part of Berner SE in Germany).
profile_positions.title: Controller Benelux

profile_positions.description:
1988-1998: Finance Manager at Multisteel BV; 1998-2000: Controller at Corus Service Center B.V.(merged entity in Maastricht). I performed various assigned functions, including finance and control, IT QM, HR and credit management.

Both position responsibilities, tasks and achievements:
☛Implemented an IT and information plan in order to merge the 2 entities
☛Merged two Finance and IT departments and eliminated cultural differences 
☛Developed and partially implemented a new MIS. Reporting to UK using Hyperion
☛Prepared and presented several business cases for major capital investments to the senior UK headoffice. All approved and implemented, growth >75% established
☛Further developed Activity Based Costing system for activating new sales channels 
☛Developed the start-up company from trade to manufacturing, huge growth, building a plant with steel production facilities
☛Led the company to global no. 2 position (ROCE%) after building a production plant 
☛Set up HR, ERP system, ABC, IT networks and MIS.

Company is a flat steel product service centre in Maastricht of a leading international steel producer, established after a merge of British Steel and Hoogovens. Sales € 120M, 325 employees) .
profile_positions.title: Finance Manager / Controller
